modName: Gizmodians FF7 Ultima Blade Skyrim Version
summary: Port of Gizmoadians inspired Ultima Blade from Oblivion to Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
-----------------------------------
Gizmodians FF7 Ultima Blade Skyrim Version
-----------------------------------

This is a mod which adds the Ultima Blade (Gizmodian) from Oblivion to Skyrim.
I also added a retextured version from the sword that i called a \"ice\" version.
Please endorese the original author from this mod and my version ;-) . 

Now also on Steam Workshop !



Requirement
=========
Just Skyrim (No DLC required)

--- !!! Important !!! ---
Please endorese the original author, Gizmodian, from the sword at:

Final Fantasy inspired Ultima Blade
http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/30659


Install
=========
Just install it manually or use the Nexus-Mod-Manager.

The Swords are craftable and ready to be tempered.

To craft it you need at least
20 Steel Ingot


To temper you need
1 Steel Ingot

Or you can just use the console.
Type in
Help Ultima

and add them to your inventory.

Enjoy!! and have fun !!

Should be compatible with all Skyrim Versions and Languages.



Credits
=========
Thanks to Bethesda for the best games.
Thanks to Square Enix for FF7, one of the best games i have ever played.
and Thanks to Gizmodian that he gave me permission to port this sword to Skyrim.



Knowing Issuise/Bugs
=========
No bugs known jet.



=== CHANGELOG ===

version 1.1
- Now with a \"Ice\" Version of the Sword.

version 1.0
- Initial release
author: mach1991 and Gizmodian
